text.en:
Rich Text Display

Usefull to display markdown or HTML.

Features Include:

  • Multiple heading levels
  • Paragraph formatting
  • Lists and quotes
  • Code blocks
This is a styled blockquote.

You can also add styled links and inline code elements.
text.ja: トップページ | お問い合わせ | 利用規約 | プライバシーポリシー | 特定商取引法に基づく表記 | 返金・キャンセルポリシー | 振込ポリシー | コミュニティガイドライン | 会社概要

_ww-text_text.en:
Welcome to the Rich Text Editor

This is a beautifully styled rich text editor with comprehensive formatting options.

Features Include:

  • Multiple heading levels
  • Paragraph formatting
  • Lists and quotes
  • Code blocks
This is a styled blockquote that stands out from regular text.

You can also add styled links and inline code elements.

source.code:
const svgSize = context.component?.props?.[/* size */ 'c1b9d2c3-7f8a-40eb-a72a-c5fbe6d89357'];
const svgColor = context.component?.props?.[/* color */ 'df9d2820-4d23-43a8-904e-c9649ae9a414'];
const path = context.component?.props?.[/* path */ '9c774612-84a1-422b-9850-131239837f42'];

return `
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
     width="${svgSize}"
     height="${svgSize}"
     viewBox="0 0 24 24"
     fill="none"
     stroke="${svgColor}"
     stroke-width="2"
     stroke-linecap="round"
     stroke-linejoin="round"
     style="display:block;"
>
${path}
</svg>
`;
